messages.subject: Re: Can Anyone Help Double Check?
messages.msgSnippet: Dunno if anyone has already answered to this one... ... only two things: - The first Sugimura Yoshitaro is miswritten as Sugimaru - It is either Todo or
messages.messageBody:
Dunno if anyone has already answered to this one...

> Can anyone just see if I got all the names correct
> before I stick this
> page on the index?
> http://www.shinsengumihq.com/ShinsengumiNames.htm

only two things:

- The first "Sugimura Yoshitaro" is miswritten as
"Sugimaru"

- It is either "Todo" or "Toudou" :) "Todou" seems a
bit inappropriate for me :)

I guess that was what caught my eye at the moment...



Serizawa Kamo

"I am the bone of my sword.
Steel is my body,and fire is my blood.
I have created over a thousand blades.
Unknown to Death.
Nor known to Life.
Have withstood pain to create many weapons.
Yet, those hands will never hold anyting.
So as I pray, unlimited blade works."

(Fate/Stay Night)
